activity.name: base
chart: Shoot off those first date jitters at the gun range.
Something about a rope course? Sounds interesting.
Apparently the food is pretty good on base.
Watch a live training exercise together.
Go see a movie at the base's theater.
Bring your A game for the wildest paintball game of your life.

activity.name: watson
chart: Party in the unfinished lobby of a megabuilding construction site.
Museum date at SovOil's Museum of Petroleum.
Corporate picnic lunch in a park near Watson Central Cubelife.
Izakaya date in the Kabuki district.
It's a surprise! They'll meet you at the Watson entrance to the High-Security Monorail.
Attend a demonstration organized by local Rockerboy Lucius Rhyne

activity.name: westbrook
chart: Be a part of a live audience on a Network 54 show.
Attend a Skate Foot race near Night City Firestation #1.
A Gala hosted by Rocklin Augmentics on their campus.
Rock climbing on the cliff below the WorldSat Offices.
Track down an elusive food truck in the area.
Grab a drink at an Executive Bar

activity.name: morro
chart: Watch a test of the Orbital Massdriver's giant steel doors.
The perfect place to watch the fireworks.
Lunch date at the Orbital Air Massdriver's employee cafeteria.
They say they have a boat docked on Morro Rock.
Double date with someone from their Family.
Ringside seats to a pit fight hosted underground at the Massdriver construction site.

activity.name: exec
chart: Fancy a round of tennis on a real organic grass court?
Brunch at your Date's favorite spot.
Pool Party at a Beaverville McMansion
Drinks in the business lounge of the Country Club.
Masquerade Party in the mansion of a rather recently deceased Exec.

activity.name: heywood
chart: They want to show you their latest piece of urban art.
Laser tag at the Zhirafa Office Park.
Somebody welded a stack of cargo containers into a speakeasy.
An industrial music concert in an industrial zone.
There's this really good teriyaki place I always eat at.
Experience the carnage of drone fighting. Those poor GRAF3s...

activity.name: domingo
chart: A street festival is coming up, and everyone is going.
Let's get drunk on Smash at Metalstorm.
The Aldecaldos are having a barbecue.
My grandma makes the best mole poblano.
There's a party tonight at the East Cargo Village.

activity.name: rancho
chart: Breakfast date at a pancake house.
Meet me and my totally real dog in the park.
Let's grab a drink at my local pub.
Mani-pedi date at the neighborhood market.
Roast weenies at a company cookout.

activity.name: outskirts
chart: My Family let me borrow our Gyrocopter.
Foraging for mushrooms is fun, I promise!
Let's go off-roading in the badlands!
Your Date says they know where to find a secret waterfall.

activity.name: perimeter
chart: A couple of my friends were going to get together, do you want to come?
We found some old fireworks. Want to fire them at abandoned cars?
Let's get tacos at my friend's truck.
Meet me at the all night diner

activity.name: europe
chart: Attend a Cooking with Kibble class at the Oasis Megamart.
Pray with them at the Holy Angels Church.
Have a wild night at the Short Circuit.
Race hot pink go-karts at the Danger Gal Offices.
A glass of wine overlooking Night City from Camden Court's rooftop lounge.

activity.name: marina
chart: Go to a game at the McCartney Field Stadium.
Rent a jetski and enjoy the bay.
Attend a press conference/fashion show hosted by Ziggurat.
Get a Johnny Silverhand at the Afterlife.
Spend a day riding the streetcar and being a tourist. It won’t break down. Probably.

activity.name: university
chart: A wild party off campus, at the University Cargo Bay.
How about a charming nature walk through Lake Park?
Tour Biotechnica's living museum in their only publicly accessible geodesic greendome.
Your Date wants to show you their new research project.
Group eating competition. Can you handle the Mega Kibbledog platter and win t-shirts?
Attend a concert being held on campus by the music department

activity.name: china
chart: Grab a drink at the Forlorn Hope.
It’s Sunday morning, time for dim sum.
Go to a Night Market together.

activity.name: japantown
chart: Enjoy a picnic overlooking the Hot Zone.
Sing karaoke in an all concrete building – great acoustics!
Your Date wants you to meet their best friend.
Attend a large parade and enjoy the atmosphere.
Your Date's father wants to meet you.

activity.name: glen
chart: Take a guided tour of City Hall.
Enjoy happy hour at an Excellent Bar
Score fresh baked goods at a local bakery. This shit is real!

activity.name: combat
chart: The Jessie James Kosher Deli is worth the risk.
Climb up to an abandoned rooftop to enjoy the view.
Romantically fire Grenade Launchers into piles of rubble.
Bring your own spray cans for a graffiti date.
Help weed your Date's rooftop garden.
Hang out in an abandoned mall.

activity.name: south
chart: Grab lunch with your date after their tattoo appointment.
Soak up the sun at the beach!
Sneak into Playland by the Sea by boat.
Your Date wants to introduce you to the whole gang.
Grab a drink at a rowdy Sea Nomad bar.
Enjoy live music in an abandoned gymnasium.

activity.name: hot
chart: Take a historic tour of the ruins!
You’re in for a wild night at the Totentanz.
Break into an old Corporate building.
Help your Date scavenge a classic piece of tech.
Attend a slightly radioactive street race.
Dine on expired MREs under the beautiful red sky

activity.name: pacifica
chart: Your Date wants to share their favorite braindance with you.
Picnic lunch in the Playland by the Sea parking lot.
A backstage tour of the Playland by the Sea Holostravaganza Concert Hall.
Shell (and shell casing!) hunting on the beach.
Ride the rides and dine on the unique Playland by the Sea Pineapple Madness Kibble.
Drag racing down by the pier.

types.name: good
beginning: You learn something new about them. That they are --keyword--.
They tell you about one of their friends who [[friend]].
They tell you about their Edgerunner job. **rolepath**
You immediately discover something you have in common.
They have a positive trait of your choice that was not apparent from their profile.
They are very attractive. Possibly Bodysculpted.
middle: You learn something new about them. That they are --keyword--.
They vent about one of their enemies. They are [[enemy]]. [[enemyreason]] The enemy has [[enemyresources]] for backup.
They tell you about a previous relationship. ||The relationship ended well.|[[tragicloves]]||.
They surprise you with a 20eb (Everyday) gift.
They stay quiet and spend the entire time listening to you talk.
end: They confide in you, talking about their life’s goal to [[goal]] .
They give you a helpful piece of advice of the GM’s choosing.
You learn about their values and outlook on life. They are motivated by [[motivations]]. [[relationships]]
They are really into you and want another date.!!
You learn about one of their great talents which is [[skills]](Base 16).
The date ended too soon to learn anything more!

types.name: weird
beginning: They tell you about three of their most recent tragic romances. One, [[tragicloves]] The second, [[tragicloves]] The last, [[tragicloves]]
Your Date is not the person from the pictures on their profile.
Your Date brought their friend along for the occasion. The friend [[friend]].
Your Date is wearing something quite strange, even by Night City standards.
Your Date has a [[gangs]] gang affiliation, and shows up in gang colors.
Your Date has a lot of cybernetics. A dangerous amount. They might be sparking
middle: Your Date excuses themselves to go to the bathroom, and never returns. Either start at the beginning with a new Date or stop dating for a while.
Your date starts a fight, and then quickly finishes it ([[combatskill]] Base 16).
You learn nothing because your Date spent the middle of the date on their Agent.
Your Date likes Smash. A lot. Possibly also Synthcoke, but you aren’t sure.

They tell you about three of their most hated enemies. One is [[enemy]]. [[enemyreason]] The enemy has [[enemyresources]] for backup. The second is [[enemy]]. [[enemyreason]] The enemy has [[enemyresources]] for backup.  The last is [[enemy]]. [[enemyreason]] The enemy has [[enemyresources]] for backup.
They talk about their [[background]] family the entire time. You learn a lot. [[familycrisis]]
end: They are really into you and want another date.!!
You learn about their values and outlook on life. They are motivated by [[motivations]]. [[relationships]]
They insist on showing you their “good luck charm” which is [[valuedPossesion]].
They give you a helpful piece of advice of the GM’s choosing.
They give you 50eb (Costly) worth of Street Drugs and/or Ammunition as a gift.
The date ended too soon to learn anything more!

chart.outcome: They want another date and promise to contact you.
They are not that into you.

variables.name: friend
chart: is like an older sibling to them
is like a younger sibling to them
was a former lover of theirs
was an old enemy of theirs
is an old childhood friend of theirs
has a common interest with them
has a common goal with them

variables.name: goal
chart: get rid of a bad reputation
get off the street no matter what it takes
cause pain and suffering to anyone who crosses them
live down their past life and try to forget it
hunt down those responsible and make them pay for wronging your Date
save, if possible, anyone from their background

variables.name: relationships
chart: They feel people are tools. Use them for your own goals then discard them.
They feel every person is a valuable individual.
They feel people are obstacles to be destroyed if they cross me.
They feel people are untrustworthy. Don't depend on anyone.
They feel people should be wiped ‘em all out and let the cockroaches take over.

variables.name: tragicloves
chart: Their lover died in an accident.
Their lover died in an accident.
A personal goal or vendetta came between them.
Their lover was killed in a fight.
Their lover was killed in a fight.
A rival cut them out of the action.
A rival cut them out of the action.

variables.name: familycrisis
chart: Their family lost everything through betrayal.
Their family lost everything through bad management.
Their family was exiled or otherwise driven from their original home/nation/Corporation.
Their family is imprisoned, and they escaped.
Their family vanished. They are the only remaining member.
Their family was killed, and they were the only survivor.
Their family is involved in a long-term conspiracy, organization, or association, such as a crime family or revolutionary group.
Their family was scattered to the winds due to misfortune.
Their family is cursed with a hereditary feud that has lasted for generations.
They inherited a family debt that they must honor before moving on with their life.

variables.name: enemyreason
chart: Caused the other to lose face.
Accused the other of some major personal flaw.
Turned down the other's offer of a job.
Turned down the other's offer of romantic involvement.
You just don't like each other.
You just don't like each other.
One of you was a romantic rival.
One of you was a business rival.
One of you set the other up for a crime they didn't commit.

variables.name: enemyresources
chart: just themselves and even they won't go out of their way
just themselves and a close friend
a powerful gang lord or small Corporation
an entire city or government or agency
